ygData.subject: Re: Charming Methods
ygData.msgSnippet: Run out of stamina from jumping?  I feel sorry for anyone who doesn t know that you can strafe - run (strafe while running forward) to get away from most mobs
ygData.messageBody:
Run out of stamina from jumping? I feel sorry for anyone who doesn't know
that you can strafe - run (strafe while running forward) to get away from
most mobs (besides HG/Cyc/wolves). Also quite useful when running long
distances.

Taluvil
